T02D3411:75b-1: shr'i kharsa p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D3411:75b-3: dpal kharsa p'a ni'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3411:75b-4: dpal ldan kharsa p'a ni la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3411:75b-5: 'dir dge bsnyen dge byed ces bya ba dge ba'i
T02D3411:75b-6: las la brtson zhing snying rje dang ldan pa zhig
T02D3411:75b-8: po ta la ker 'gro bar brtsams te chas nas
T02D3411:75b-9: kha di manda la kharsa p'a ni zhes grags pa'i
T02D3411:75b-10: grong zhig yod par bsdad pa na /
T02D3411:75b-11: der bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gnang ba byin te /
T02D3411:75b-12: khyod rang ma 'gro bar 'dir rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3411:75b-13: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rim
T02D3411:75b-14: pas nga'i sku gcig gyis dang /
T02D3411:75b-15: des sems can thams cad kyi don chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs nas /
T02D3411:75b-16: de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig myur du bzhengs so zhes thos so //
T02D3411:75b-17: de la bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa'i phyir lta ba
T02D3411:75b-18: phun sum tshogs na dge slong mchog gi tshul khrims
T02D3411:75b-19: nyams kyang sla'o / lta ba nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no //
T02D3411:75b-20: 'dir de la re zhig chos thams cad bdag med
T02D3411:75b-21: par rnam par bltas nas rnam par rtog pa mtha'
T02D3411:75b-22: dag spangs te / brtse ba'i bsam pas kye ma
T02D3411:75b-23: sems can 'di rnams nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D3411:75b-24: las kyi bar du gcod pas sdug bsngal ba ste
T02D3411:75b-25: dag spangs te / / de la skye ba dang /
T02D3411:75b-28: 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis shin tu mnar ba
T02D3411:75b-29: dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dpag tu med pa'i
T02D3411:75b-30: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la /
T02D3411:75b-31: de'i phyir bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgrubs te /
T02D3411:75b-32: de rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad bsal zhing /
T02D3411:76a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @76a * //
T02D3411:76a-1: dgod par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas /
T02D3411:76a-2: rang gi snying gar pam yig las skyes pa'i padma
T02D3411:76a-3: 'dab ma stong gi lte ba'i dbus su aa yig
T02D3411:76a-4: las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3411:76a-5: aom t'am sum bhrim ham zhes pa'i sa bon lnga
T02D3411:76a-6: bkod la / de rnams kyi 'od zer gyis yang
T02D3411:76a-7: dag par bskul zhing bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang
T02D3411:76a-8: bkod la / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan drangs te /
T02D3411:76a-9: mdun gyi nam mkha'i mthil du bzhugs nas phyag dang /
T02D3411:76a-12: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa bdun nam bcu gcig byas te /
T02D3411:76a-13: byams pa dang snying rje dang /
T02D3411:76a-15: btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3411:76a-16: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva
T02D3411:76a-17: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pas stong pa
T02D3411:76a-18: nyid kyi byang chub tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das
T02D3411:76a-19: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor du bdag
T02D3411:76a-20: nyid byas te / de yang ston ka'i zla ba
T02D3411:76a-21: bzhin du dkar zhing ral pa'i cod pan 'od dpag
T02D3411:76a-22: med kyi dbu la brgyan cing /
T02D3411:76a-23: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3411:76a-25: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng na padma 'dab ma stong la rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa /
T02D3411:76a-28: g-yas na bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D3411:76a-29: mdun na sgrol ma sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3411:76a-30: gser sngon po'i mdog lta bu dkar zhing mkhregs la mtho ba /
T02D3411:76a-31: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3411:76a-32: phyag gnyis na autpal sdong bu dang bcas pa bsnams shing spyan gyis gzigs pa'o //
T02D3411:76a-33: de'i rjes su nor bzangs gzhon nu gser 'bar ba lta bu rin po che'i rgyan dang /
T02D3411:76a-34: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3411:76a-35: phyag g-yon na ka p'a li bsnams shing thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3411:76a-36: de'i rjes su khro gnyer can ral pa'i cod pan steng du brdzes pas brgyan pa /
T02D3411:76a-37: gser 'bar ba lta bu na bza' dmar po yongs su bsnams pa /
T02D3411:76a-38: phyag g-yas pa phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul du byas pa /
T02D3411:76a-40: g-yon pa dag gis dbyu gu rtse gsum dang /
T02D3411:76a-41: ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa /
T02D3411:76b-0: de'i rjes su rta mgrin dbu skra @76b dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D3411:76b-1: sku mdog dmar po klu'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3411:76b-2: lto ba 'phyang zhing stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa /
T02D3411:76b-3: phyag na dbyug pa bsnams pa /
T02D3411:76b-4: de bzhin du lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3411:76b-5: de nas mandal byas te cho ga 'dis mchod par bya'o //
T02D3411:76b-6: de nas dang po mandal byas nas bsrung ba bya ste /
T02D3411:76b-7: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra
T02D3411:76b-8: ti sa re raksha raksha mam h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D3411:76b-11: aom a'a gatstsha bha ga w'an mandal la ka sim
T02D3411:76b-12: h'a sa ne aom a'a:zhes pa'i sngags brjod nas gsol
T02D3411:76b-14: mandal gyi dbus su seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du padma 'dab ma stong la bzhugs pa /
T02D3411:76b-15: lnga'i bdag nyid mchod par bya'o //
T02D3411:76b-16: de la mchod pa'i sngags ni /
T02D3411:76b-20: aom badzra a'a h'a re h'um /
T02D3411:76b-21: mchod cing bstod de sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3411:76b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza me gha pra sa r'a mu he h'um /
T02D3411:76b-23: mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
T02D3411:76b-24: aom a'a t'am bhr'im ham phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3411:76b-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza la li
T02D3411:76b-26: ta na mi reeta na m'a mi bha ga w'an
T02D3411:76b-27: tam dza:h'um bam ho:pra ho:pra t'itstsha ku su ma aanydza
T02D3411:76b-29: zhes pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags so //
T02D3411:76b-30: aom mu:sv'a h'a zhes pa ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D3411:76b-31: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3411:76b-32: grihna grihna tu sarba bh'u ti k'a ai mam ba lim sv'a h'a /
T02D3411:76b-33: zhes pa ni gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D3411:76b-34: de nas mchod pa rtsom pa'i dus su de bzhin du brjod nas sems sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3411:76b-35: gang yang spyod pa ngan pa rnams /
T02D3411:76b-36: bdag gis spang zhing sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3411:76b-37: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams la bslab po //
T02D3411:76b-38: bdag gis ji srid nus pas mchod pa bsgrub po //
T02D3411:76b-39: gang yang mi bya ba ni de yang 'dod chags las skyes pa dang /
T02D3411:76b-40: zhe sdang las skyes pa dang /
T02D3411:76b-41: gti mug las skyes pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams so //
T02D3411:76b-42: 'dir thams cad de bzhin du sems can 'dod chags dang /
T02D3411:76b-44: gti mug gi bsam pa can rnams dang /
T02D3411:76b-45: de bzhin du 'dod chags las skyes pa'i dge ba'i
T02D3411:76b-46: rtsa ba ni klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye
T02D3411:76b-48: zhe sdang las skyes pa ni r'a ma na'o //
T02D3411:76b-49: gti mug las skyes pa ni gnod sbyin rnam thos sras so //
T02D3411:77a-3: gti mug la sogs pa yongs su spangs nas sems sbyangs te /
T02D3411:77a-4: thams cad de bzhin du snying rje'i sems kyi rang
T02D3411:77a-5: bzhin gyis sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
